greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(A051612(n), A065387(n)), where A051612(n) = sigma(n) - phi(n) and A065387(n) = sigma(n) + phi(n).
comment: If a(n)=1, then n is either square or twice a square.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 06 2002
